trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>evento ocorre quando um painel de marcas inteligentes é exibido ou oculto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é gerado diretamente pelo painel, mas em vez disso, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>quando seu <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>métodos são executados.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento, o `relatedObject` parâmetro sempre referencia o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>que o painel está associado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que está associado com o painel.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se o painel está sendo exibido ou oculto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um sinalizador que indica se a marca inteligente painel está sendo exibido ou oculto.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Se o painel está sendo ocultado por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>método, essa propriedade tem um valor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Se o painel está sendo exibido por meio de uma chamada para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, essa propriedade tem um valor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"></xref> that indicates the state of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"> </xref> que indica o estado do painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto que está associado com o painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RelatedObject permite que o programador associar um objeto para uma instância da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto, em seguida, está disponível para os métodos que manipulam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>associado com o painel de marcas inteligentes.</xref:System.Object>
